cause.description:
STOP RACISM
The definition of racism is discrimination or prejudice towards a different race. It is treating someone unfairly or differently because they belong to a different nationality or religion. There are different forms of racism. Here are the most common ones:
1) verbal threats or insults. 2) violence/personal attacks.
This page stands against racism towards ALL skin colours.
If you agree with ANYTHING you have just read, dont hesistate to join and show your support!
1. RACISM MUST STOP
2. LETS FIGHT AGAINST RACISM
3. RACISM IS THE WORST THING KNOWN TO MAN
